text:
Repository: bunny-temp-storage
Purpose: Provides temporary asset storage using BunnyCDN for workflows requiring fast-access public URLs.

Capabilities:
- Accepts upload requests via API calls.
- Returns short-lived public URLs for consumption by automation tools.
- Supports image-based automations, redirects, and content preview workflows.
- Designed to integrate with Zapier and Monday.com.

Technologies: JavaScript, BunnyCDN API, HTTP upload handling, automation compatibility.
